item.title: Bread slices littered on street, 7th October
item.description:
About 15 bread slices strewn over road at start of Hengist Rd. In addition also lots of rubbish from tissues, crisp packets, plastic bottles...when is Hengist, Ethelbert and Horsa road going to be cleaned...this week should be 3 weeks since the last street cleaning especially as these roads see majority of foot traffic
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hengist Road, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet
